comments.comment: No smoke without fire!!! This is the worst era where monks were openly abused by people and even by other monks. Monks openly joined hands with politicians like nikayas. The words some monks used were really unsuitable for monks. The way some of them behaved was unacceptable. No chief monks tries to advice young monks to behave well in open places. University demonstrations showed monks climbing walls etc. Some senior monks even raised their hands high up and yelled. Almost all these videos were shown in public by so called TV channels without knowing that these clips have gone internationally. This is the ways the TV channels behaved to pull the country down and down grading Buddhist monks. Many overseas channels like BBC, FOX, Al Jazeera  and so on gave a good publicity against Buddhism. Monks here did not even bade a breathing sound to prevent this. Buddhist philosophy/Dhamma is against the division of society into casts etc. Monks know this better than us. But monks are divided today into Nikayas and further into sub divisions of nikayas. Most disastrously they are divided into political parties. Without knowing the cunning activities of the politicians some monks talk strongly to support them. So it is obvious that people insult such monks who knowingly support looting politicians and unpatriotic politicians. They should not have joined politics which is purely a business. Who  are the head priests who have so far raised a strong voice to make unity among priests without divisions. We do not have a leader among the priests. This is a bad example. It seems they too are greedy of positions. So called head priests supposed to have power to discipline other young priests have not been seen doing that. Monks MUST show exemplary behaviour. If monks actually like Buddhism and the country like those in the past must work together for the sake of the country and NOT for the sake of politicians. Who are the priests now talking about MCC???? The weakness among some of our monks is to accept what their politicians do  bad as good.
comments.author: Homo zeylanicus

comments.comment: This monk acts as a racist, and extremist thinks that the current president was elected only by Sinhala Buddhist votes if that claim is acceptable what happened to Sinhala Christian votes, where did they go. Buddhism had great respect in Sri Lanka but its dignity is fading away every single minute and every single second.  Buddhist clergy's tears are rolling down and are crying that they know that Buddhism is going up towards the negative hill in Sri Lanka after Sinhala people are getting understand that Buddhist temples are becoming a business places where politicians could invade abruptly.  This is happening neither in Catholic church nor in the Islamic mosque. Only in Buddhist temples. Nobody disgraced Buddhist monks except Buddhist politicians and Buddhist people, so that this problem needs to be solved between monks and Buddhist people.  Do not direct your fingers on other religions because Catholic priests, Islamic  Mowlavi's have not been sold or have not been naked in front of corrupted politicians as Buddhist monks did.  Buddhist monks have not understood their responsibilities and jobs on behalf of their people yet,  still, praise politicians' sake of narrow political gains.  Pat on your heart and ask your selves if I am wrong.  Buddhism is ending from Sri Lanka is not far, it is around the corner.  The Muslim population is growing every day, and the most recent data reveal that the Muslim population in SL passes the Sinhala Buddhist population by 2050.  This is obvious and a piece of cake as long as Buddhist monks are divided and lay down with politicians, Sinhala people reject them.
comments.author: Mark Brooks

comments.comment:
Oba wahansela budun sarana giya num ada oba wahansela dharma deshana karanne niwanata path wela. Oba wahansela upasampadawedi budunta dunna eka poronduwak thamai "thaman mey kaha siwura daganne thaman niwan dakala anik ayatath niwanata maga penwannai" kiyala. Nathuwa anik ayawa hadana eka nemei budu dahama. Yatharthaya araksha karanna kauruwath ona na, yatharthaya katawath winasa karanna ba. Siddhartha Gautama deshana kaley "uppada waya dammino" kiyala. Namuth oba wahansela hama welawema deyak sadakalika karaganna hadana ekenma oba wahasela inna dharmaya mokakda kiyala oba wahanselatama hithala balanna wenawa.


Hamuduruwane budha kiyanne yatharthayata. Ehema nathuwa naama roopa dekakata nemei. Bauddhaya kiyanne yatharthayata path wu pudgayalayata. Sanga kiyanne yatharthayata path wela anik ayatath yatharthayata path wenna maga penwana kenata.
Manussaya hama welawema gini gannawa awiddhiyawa nisa. Awiddhiyawen nidahas unaama niwenawa. Ekai nivana. Andumen sangarathnaya anduranna ba. Ada chiwara dharin kiyana wachanaya eliyata awith thiyenne andumen sangarathnaya wenna hadana nisai.


Pansal wala gruha niramana shilpaya num sahena watinawa, e dewal walin sadahan karala thiyenne dharmaya. Dharmaya wachana walin hariyata denna ba. Namuth kalaawen saha thakshanayen puluwan. Api e dewal araksha karanna ona. Namuth api yatharthayata path wenne nathuwa goda nagili witharak thibila athida? Oba wahansela yatharthayata misak maga penwanna ona goda nagili araksha karanna nemei issarahata yanna ona. Yatharthaya mathu wenakota hama deyakma samakamiwa thiyenawa.


Siddhartha Gautama gihi geya ath arala giye jathi, jaraa, wiyadhi, marana walin nidahas weemata. Ethuma e dewal walin nidahas una nisa buddha kiyala amanthranaya kara. E wagema buddha thamai yatharthaya kiyala kiyanawa. E kiyanne jathi, jara, wiyadhi marana kiyanne awiddhiyawa. Budu dahame jathi, jara, wiyadhi, marana na. Namuth oba wahansela deshana karanne eka nemei. Oba wahansela deshana karanne yatharthaya thamai jathi, jaraa, wiyadhi, marana kiyala.


Oba wahanselata daanaya pooja karanne oba wahansela yatharthayata path wenna sahena wehesak ganna ona nisai. Rakiyawak karana gaman e katayauththa tikak amarui. Ehema nathuwa pin walata nemei. Oba wahansela kalpana karala balanna oba wahasela inne budun ekkada? Deshana karanne yatharthayada kiyala. Thawa kal na hamuduruwane ape waradi hadaganna.


Ona karanne yatharthaya misak awiddhiyawen deyak rakaganna nemei. Yatharthayata path wela hamadekinma nidahas wennai ona.


Api Oba wahanselata pooja karana daanaye uparima pryojana aran oba wahansela niwanata path wela anik ayatath maga penwanna. Ehema nathuwa oba wahansela awiddhiyawema hira wela anik ayatath andakarayema inna widihata desha thiyala eka budu dahama kiyanna epa.


Wasala suthraye deshana karala thiyenawa ne sangarathnayata pooja karana daanayak sangrathnaya kiyala penisita pili gathtoth eka kochchara darunu deyakda kiyala.
comments.author: IML

comments.comment:
oba wahanse dunnu speech eka kageth es kan erenna dunnu desanawa e wagema   
mun denan hitiye nr siure ethi blaya mun wahansela weni desa mamaka buddimatun nitara nitra maddiyata wadamawa harawath desana pawath wanna tawa tawath un wahanselta puluwan jatiya awadikrawanna bedekin torawa enisa buddimath bikshungen yuth komitiyak goda nganna ratata uneahasnsela nayakathwe ha niwaredi maga pennavi
me pannare lebuwe unwahansela eda tibu piriwen addiyapane tulin ada eka wala pallata gihin 
pali sankuruta shinghsala mewa sema pasalakatama itihaseth ekka uganwanna wahama nawa agamethi janadipatiitumata karunu pahada denna ewa aniwarya krwanna weti ethi piriwen addiyapane goda ganna jatika weda piliwelak yodanna irida dham pasal aniwarya krwanna pitiwen walta hekitak gihi druwanta igena ganna pahskum denna 
buddagajje sakas kada nam pota weni granta uganwanna hitopadese pancha tantre jatakatta katawa pali sankuruta pitriwenha anekuth siyaluma pasal visayta etul kra ugan wanna edata me lmai seba itihase kumakda kiya bedekim torawa terum gani den meka beda ette al kurane kiyai baibale kiyai mekenuth me warga agam beda goda negi eta ara hamuduruwe mini waladaana kanatu gena desana kla wage enisa harendra mhttayo mewa terum aran meweni watina ugatun regenavith desana pwathwanna sema pasalk pasama 
e wagema ara ruwan weli mahaseya wage goda naga tibba ampare dozar krapu saagama seya yali goda negimata piyawara ganna weda piliwelk maha sangya ekatukrn rajayta krunu kiya weda patan ganna me rate bedekin torawa minissu ewata viyadam krai ewagema vihara maha devi uttamaviya goda bessa abideka kla muhudu maha mgul vihareta ayath akkara haraseeyama apahu labadenna rajayta bala ktwanna eka me mulu mhath jatiytama veerodara daruwan bihikala dutugemunuge mawatath dytugrmunu narapatiytath saddatissa rajutath kawantissa rajugeth aitin me uduran ette ewa apahu nidahs krwanna
ewagema dalada hamuduruwange barakarthweta himikam kiyana niyama parapure antima putuka lesa yapahhuwe inna e nilame tuma you tiube eka hraha e paramprika urume wenuwem krana satanata sahadee etuma dalada maligawe sri danta datuwe arakshakaya krwanna me ugath maha sngaya wahasela ekka pera muna ganna 
loka bissenes karayo maligawe ha anekuth siyalu dewala wala nilame warun kra gena kragana ethi maha akusala karmawalinda maha sangaya nidahas krwana weda piliwelk kalochitawa sakas viyayutui dewala wala ha mligawe weni tenwala inna nilamelage wath kam hoya ballanna kotiprokoti salli krayo ewagema etamnilamela dewala santaka msligawa santaka idam kotas kramin vivida unge henchchiyyalata badu demim vikunamin vikuna dama eta mewa hoya blana jatika sanga sanstawak pth krwa ewa kra eti nilamelawa tanaturuwalin nerapa mitiya hamuwata un genna jatika mattame weda piliwel me ugath vinydara swamin wahansela denuwath krwamin sakachchwalta badun krwanna oni tram jnatawa tora turu dei nilamela dewala santaka depola walata kra eti hanin gena mewa maha sangayata ayath dewal sambudda sasaneta ayath dewal puja krpu deviyanta piduwe vehera vihara yana mamenam ewa pansal satudepola  mewa kerehith es erena madddiya sakachcha arabana lesa krunawen illami oya bahubuta maddiya weda satahan walin torwa

replies.replyComment: @Joe Xavi In a real Buddhist country how long a killer, liar, thief can be the leader. I believe it is very short. Short sighted monks, with wisdom to know the real , chose the wrong man to support. Buddhism doesn't mean buildings and roads. Successive leaders of the country for a long time neglected the Buddhists and also Sinhalese. Now , some thieves have cheated to be representing Sinhala Buddhists have come to power. They will do immense damage to very core of the nation who expected a lot from them ( with no wisdom developed). Ranil Wickremasinghe is an enemy visible. These bunch of thieves are acting like protectors, but they are destroyers of Buddhism. Wait and see and simply remember me when you realise who they are.

This is a budddhist country. Preference should be given to duddism. Its the job of the duty of the government to nurture real buddism. Buddism should not be anyones tool for political gains. Sanga should live it politicians should live it and the rest will follow
